_comment: Example tileset configuration for the tile server
_comment_formats: Supports both directory and tar archive sources

_notes.tar_format: Tar files must contain {z}/{x}/{y.ext} somewhere inside
_notes.base_path: Use base_path to specify subdirectory within tar archive
_notes.auto_detect: If base_path is omitted, server will auto-detect structure where possible
_notes.performance: Uncompressed .tar is 5-10x faster than compressed formats
_notes.inspection: Use inspect_tar.py to analyze tar structure before configuration
